audioText: Il faut chercher par-ci par-là dans tous les tiroirs.
question: How should one search according to the text?
options: Here and there in all the drawers
explanation: The text states 'Il faut chercher par-ci par-là dans tous les tiroirs' - One must search here and there in all the drawers. 'Par-ci par-là' means 'here and there' or 'in various places'.
